text: the next time you're craving a snack and
you want to keep things on the healthier
side but still make them delicious try
brown rice cake as the base they're
wonderful they're salty and crunchy and
they have a relatively neutral flavor so
you can put all kinds of different
toppings on them I'm going to show you
six today but you could really use your
imagination and try other things too so
here is avocado and black sesame seeds
and tamari that simple no tamari is like
soy sauce it's made from fermented soy
beans but it's gluten free because it
does not contain wheat so just layer a
few slices of avocado a little tamari
for flavor and black sesame seeds they
offer a little crunch and that wonderful
sesame flavor that has a little bit of
an Asian Flair the next one this is
really my jam Nova LOX neufchatel cheese
which is like a cream cheese similar in
flavor and texture but lower in fat
really creamy just a little bit of Tang
which is nice against the smoky buttery
fish the smoked salmon lots of that for
me this is a good alternative to your
classic bagel with salmon and cream
cheese capers I love you don't have to
do this but I enjoy them have a nice
salty flavor a little red onion and to
finish things off a fresh herb like dill
dill is excellent with smoked salmon I
think that's gonna be the one I eat and
why not go green with cucumbers and
ricotta cheese you could use a low-fat
ricotta I personally like full fat
ricotta and lots and lots of crunchy
cucumbers just pile them up as many as
you want and this one needs a little
more seasoning salt and pepper this
would also be good with a drizzle of
olive oil this one I love a little bit
of the flavors of Middle East tahini
which is made from ground sesame seeds I
have these beautiful little cherry
tomatoes of varying colors wow so pretty
and parsley now this one is interesting
it may seem like an odd collection of
ingredients but it's actually really
delicious good old peanut butter I'm
sure you have a jar of that in your
house and then
pick up the heat a little bit with
chilli sauce yes I said it chilli sauce
it may sound strange with peanut butter
but it's so delicious you have to try
this and toasted coconut gives a little
bit of an exotic tropical Flair how
beautiful is that
and I've saved the best for last satisfy
your sweet tooth with a dessert version
this one uses nut butter
I have almond butter here but you could
use cashew butter even peanut butter
chocolate hazelnut spread my favorite
and this is wonderful with fresh
raspberries or strawberries blackberries
any kind of berry you have around and a
good drizzle of honey for sweetness oh
yeah indulgent for sure but definitely
not naughty all six of these brown rice
cakes are delicious bursting with flavor
and you won't miss the toast I promise
you
you
you
